Spec.title: Level 62 Speedrun Variant - SEE BOTTOM NOTE

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xE05030^xC8C8C8-------^7 ^xE05030^xC8C8C8^xE05030Act 1^7 -------
Colours to look out for: ^x8888FFBBB^7, ^x8888FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7, ^x8888FF^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7, ^x70FF70G^7^xE05030R^7
Currency required: 2-3x ^x8888FFTransmutes^7, 2x^x8888FF Alteration^7 10-15x ^xAF6025Wisdom^7 scrolls (look out for ^xE05030iron rings^7)
-------
After killing Hillock, enter town and look for good coloured items and a ^x8888FFmagic driftwood scepter^7. (you can keep the R G B scepter dropped by hillock, the colours will come in handy)
pick up ^xB97123^xB97123^xADAA47^x7070FFRolling Magma^7^7^7^7 (quest reward) and link to ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFElemental Proliferation^7^7 (you already own this). This combination is very strong due to ignite proliferation.
After mudflats and Tidal island and pick up the follwing Gems in Order of priority depending on the amount of Wisdom scrolls you have:
^x70FF70^7^xFFFF77^xC8C8C8Quest reward^7s^7^7: ^x70FF70Onslaught^7^7 (quest reward) - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFFrost Bomb^7^7 (quest reward) -^x7070FF Frostblink^7^x3F6DB3 ^xC8C8C8(quest reward) ^7
^xC8C8C8Vendor Gems^7: ^xADAA47^x7070FFStormblastmine^7 ^7- ^x3F6DB3^xADAA47^x7070FFOrb of Storms^7^7^7 - ^xB97123^xB97123^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7^7^7 - ^xADAA47^x7070FFArcane Surge^7^7 - ^xE05030War Banner^7^7
Links in order of priority ( /+ means link only if you have the colours otherwise put at random): ^x70FF70 Onslaught^7 + ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFFrostbomb^7^7^7 /+ ^xADAA47^x7070FFOrb of storms^7 ^7 ^xB97123^xE05030^x7070FFRolling Magma^7^7^7^7^7 + ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFElemental Proliferation^7^7^7 ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFFrostblink^7^7 + ^x7070FF^xADAA47^x7070FFarcane Surge^7^7^7 ^xB97123^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7^7 ^xB97123^xE05030War Banner^7^7
Drop portal at Submerged Passage Stairs and make your way to the lower prison. You can still use ^xB97123Rolling Magma^7 as your main ability or already start using a one link ^xADAA47Stormblastmine^7, up to you Take the waypoint back to town and go though TP - enter The flooded Depths to kill the Dweller of the Deep
Make sure to keep track of your currency along the way. Your main priority will be to get an ^x8888FFAlteration^7. Usually 3 identified items will sold to the Vendor will result in 1x ^x8888FFAlteration^7^7. Adittionaly you will need enough Wisdom scrolls to buy a ^xE05030Iron ring^7 from the Vendor to sell with a ^x70FF70green Skill gem^7, it will grant you a white ^xADAA47Topaz^7 ring. Should you be unlucky, and the vendor didn't sell you a ^x7070FFmagic driftwood scepter^7^7, you will also require a ^x8888FFTransmute^7.
In a perfect world you should now be lvl 8+ and able to create your first Caster weapon before entering the lower Prison again.
Create ^xADAA47Flat added lightning Scepter^7 -> Vendor 1x white ^xADAA47Topaz^7 ring + 1x^x8888FF Magic Scepter^7 + 1x ^x8888FFAlteration^7
Quest reward: ^x7070FFadded Lightning^7
Switch out ^xB97123^xE05030^x7070FFRolling Magma^7^7^7 /^x3F6DB3 Elemental Proliferation^7 with^xADAA47 ^x7070FFStormblastmine^7^7 / ^xADAA47^x7070FFadded Lightning^7^7
Make your way through the Prison and Kill Brutus. Always pick up as much items as possible and try to get another Scepter craft ready.
Quest reward: ^x7070FFFlame dash^7
replace ^x3F6DB3Frostblink^7 with ^x7070FFFlame dash^7 at level 10
On to the Cavern of Wrath, do the Fairgraives skillpoint along the way. If you are not super unlucky after killing Fairgraives is the latest point where you should be able to create your second ^xADAA47added Lightning^7^7 Sceepter craft
Quest reward: ^xADAA47^x7070FFStormbrand^7^7
Vendor: ^xE05030Leap Slam^7 (if you have 1x ^x8888FFTransmute^7, otherwise return for it later)
Final Act 1 Links:
^x70FF70Onslaught^7^7 + ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFFrostbomb^7^7^7 /+ ^xADAA47^x7070FFOrb of storms^7 ^7 ^xB97123^x7070FFStormblastmine^7^7 + ^x7070FFadded Lightning^7^7^7 /+ ^xADAA47^x7070FFStormbrand^7^7 ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFFrostblink^7^7 + ^x7070FF^xADAA47^x7070FFarcane Surge^7^7^7 ^xB97123^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7^7 ^xB97123^xE05030War Banner^7^7
You can always make sure, before going through Cavern of Wrath and onto killing Merveil to pick up:
1-2x ^x3F6DB3Sapphire Ring^7 cause she deals tons of cold damage 1x ^xE05030Greater Life Flask^7 if you dont have a good one
Makes your life at Merveil alot easier.
-------^7 ^xE05030Act 2 ^xC8C8C8-------^7
Colours to look out for: ^x8888FFBBB^7, ^x8888FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7, ^x8888FF^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7, ^x70FF70G^7^xE05030R^7 (whatever you are missing, ^x7070FFBBB^7 and ^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7 is very important later, and ^x70FF70G^7^xE05030R^7 for ^xE05030leap^7 / ^x70FF70faster attack^7 too)
Currency required: 5-7x^x8888FF Alteration^7, 2x ^xAF6025Alchemy Orb^7 or Essence, 2x Topaz ring
-------
Act 2 I usually start by going right into the Old Fields, skipping Den since we are Leap slamming already or if not able to buy it, soon. Pick as many ^xFFFF77rares^7 as possible, to identify + Sell them to stack up ^x7070FFAlterations^7.
After Killing Fidelitas in Chamber of sins pick up Heralds.
Quest reward: ^xADAA47^x7070FFHerald of Thunder^7^7
Vendor: ^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7
After that go left to the Western Forest and Kill Weaver.
Quest reward: ^x7070FFFaster Casting^7
Vendor: ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 - ^xADAA47^x7070FFWave of Conviction^7^7
Kill All Bandits, Alira last to pair it up with "the Way Foreward" Skillpoint quest.
You should be around lvl 18 now and your link Setup will look as follows:
Lvl 18 links: (Drop ^xE05030Holy Flame^7 and ^x7070FFFrostbomb^7)
^x70FF70Onslaught^7^7^7 + ^x3F6DB3^xADAA47^x7070FFStormbrand^7^7 ^xC8C8C8+^7 ^x8888FF^x7070FFFaster casting^7^7 ^xB97123^xADAA47^x7070FFWave of Conviction^7^7^7 /^x7070FF added Lightning^7^xADAA47 ^xC8C8C8or^7 ^x7070FFPhysical to Lightning ^7/ ^xADAA47^x7070FFarcane Surge^7 ^xE05030Leap Slam^7 + ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 ^x3F6DB3^xADAA47^x7070FFOrb of Storms^7 ^7/+ ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7 /+ ^x7070FFadded Lightning^7 ^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7 ^x7070FFHerald of Thunder^7 ^xE05030War Banner^7^7
(If you have waaaay to many Alterations pick up and insanly good links: ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7 + ^x7070FFPhysical to Lightning^7, but keep in mind that you need 2x ^x7070FFAlterations^7 later for Scepter crafts)
Now we do the Trial in the Crypt since we traverse pretty fast due to Leap slam. Then make your Way through the Vaal ruins and go to Vaal oversoul
Throughout all of Act 2 we want to keep in mind our Goal for crafting lvl 20. flat ^xADAA47added Lightning Scepters^7.
For this we need 2x^x8888FF Alteration^7, 2x ^xAF6025Alchemy Orb^7 or Essence, 2x Topaz ring + 1x ^x7070FFPortal scroll^7
Once we reach Vaal oversoul, we are lvl 21 ~ and we initiate his spawn animation and prepare the Scepter crafts and take a TP scroll to Town.
They recipe works as follows: lvl 20: Create 2x flat ^xADAA47added Lightning Scepters^7 -> Vendor 2x ^xFFFF77rare^7 ^xADAA47Topaz^7 rings + 2x ^x8888FFmagic scepter^7 + 2x ^x7070FFAlteration^7 (you can obviously use your already crafter magic Scepters that you have equipped)
Back into the TP and kill Vaal Oversoul.
-------^7 ^xE05030Act 3 onwards ^xC8C8C8-------^7
4 Links to look out for : ^x7070FFBB^7^x8888FFBB^7 / ^x70FF70^x7070FFBBB^7^x70FF70G^7^7
Currency required: 3-5x^x8888FF Alteration^7
In Act 3 resistance becomes pretty important. I usually pick up a variety of Rings so i can always adjust depending on the Damage mods of the Zone.
if you have the nessesary 4 links you could potentially already have the link setup until maps starting at lvl 24:
^x70FF70Onslaught^7^7^7^7 + ^x3F6DB3^xADAA47^x7070FFStormbrand^7^7 ^xC8C8C8+^7 ^x8888FF^x7070FFFaster casting^7^7 /+ ^x7070FFadded Lightning^7 ^xB97123^xADAA47^x7070FFWave of Conviction^7^7^7 /^x7070FF added Lightning^7^xADAA47 ^7/ ^xADAA47^x7070FFarcane Surge^7 /+ ^x7070FFPhysical to Lightning ^7(if you lack sockets you can put both Wave aswell as oos in one 4 link in the beginning)^7 ^xE05030Leap Slam^7 + ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 /+ ^xE05030endurance charge on on melee Stun^7 ^x3F6DB3^xADAA47^x7070FFOrb of Storms^7 ^7/ ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7 / ^x7070FFadded Lightning^7 /+ ^x7070FFLightning Penetration^7 ^xE05030War Banner^7^7^7
We drop the heralds and use the following Auras:
^xE05030Determination ^7 ^x7070FFWrath^7 ^x7070FFClarity^7
you will be able to use all of them lvl 38, when we pick up the first reservation efficiency Cluster.
Until then choose either defensive or offensive option depending on your gear and league you are starting in.
at lvl 38 you can add additional Defense with
^xE05030Cast when Damage Taken^7 + ^xE05030Steelskin^7
--> This is your final Gem setup until you transition into whatever caster build you desire at BA or Maps etc. You can also see the gems under the POB Skills section.
Leveling Pantheon: Brine King (Stun reduction) / Ralakesh^xD02090^xD02090 ^7(^7^7Bleed reduction, esepcially good for Lab)^7
Ascendancy Note: Most used ascendancy will probably be Inquisitor in which case i suggest taking "Sanctuary" first then "Pious Path"
It works just as well on any Templar ascendancy but if you want to level f.e Minions as a caster i recommend Armageddon brand Cremation, which i will release a quick guide aswell.^xADAA47^xADAA47
^xE05030Note^7: The Speedrun Variant i used in the Video for slighty more Attack speed focused. For Leaguestart i would recommend not going that route since Leap slam is already fast and the other one is more Damage and balanced
It works just as well on any Templar ascendancy but if you want to level f.e Minions as a caster i recommend Armageddon brand Cremation, which i will release a quick guide aswell.^xADAA47^xADAA47^xD02090^xD02090^xD02090^xD02090
